mapper.select: select nvl(home_phone, work_phone) from dstdb where dist_id=#{distId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO web_category_back VALUES (#{itemCode}, #{categoryKey}, #{displayOrder}, #{disclaimer}, #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM web_category_back WHERE item_code = #{itemCode} AND category_key = #{categoryKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE web_category_back SET display_Order = #{displayOrder} WHERE item_code = #{itemCode} AND category_key = #{categoryKey}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM web_category_back WHERE item_code = #{itemCode} AND category_key = #{categoryKey}
mapper.select: select * from web_category_back WHERE start_DAte > #{param1} AND end_date < #{param2}
